SEARCH
Package Core.Managers

Class WindowManager

java.lang.Object
Core.Managers.WindowManager
public class WindowManager extends Object
The WindowManager class manages the creation, configuration, and interaction with the GLFW window in an OpenGL application, including input handling, window resizing, and updating the projection matrix.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • WindowManager

      public WindowManager(String title, int width, int height, boolean vSync)
      Constructs a new WindowManager instance with the specified title, width, height, and VSync setting.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the window.
      width - The initial width of the window.
      height - The initial height of the window.
      vSync - Whether VSync is enabled.

  • Method Details

    • init

      public void init()
      Initializes GLFW, creates a window, and sets various window hints based on configuration options. Sets up GLFW callbacks for window resizing and key events.

    • update

      public void update()
      Swaps the front and back buffers, and polls for events.

    • cleanup

      public void cleanup()
      Destroys the GLFW window when the application is closing.

    • setClearColor

      public void setClearColor(float r, float g, float b, float a)
      Sets the clear color for the window.
      Parameters:
      r - Red component of the clear color.
      g - Green component of the clear color.
      b - Blue component of the clear color.
      a - Alpha component of the clear color.

    • isKeyPressed

      public boolean isKeyPressed(int keycode)
      Checks if a specific key is currently pressed.
      Parameters:
      keycode - The key code to check.
      Returns:
      True if the key is pressed; false otherwise.

    • windowShouldClose

      public boolean windowShouldClose()
      Checks if the window should close.
      Returns:
      True if the window should close; false otherwise.

    • getTitle

      public String getTitle()
      Gets the title of the window.
      Returns:
      The title of the window.

      Sets the title of the window.
      Parameters:
      title - The new title for the window.

    • updateProjectionMatrix

      public org.joml.Matrix4f updateProjectionMatrix()
      Updates and retrieves the projection matrix based on the current width and height of the window.
      Returns:
      The updated projection matrix.

    • updateProjectionMatrix

      public org.joml.Matrix4f updateProjectionMatrix(org.joml.Matrix4f matrix, int width, int height)
      Updates the provided matrix with the projection matrix based on the specified width and height.
      Parameters:
      matrix - The matrix to update.
      width - The width used for the projection matrix.
      height - The height used for the projection matrix.
      Returns:
      The updated matrix.
